name: Disco Dayz
description:
I made a rhythm game for the 9th Kindred Jam, with the theme of "Jam!" I wanted to think out of the box, so the "jam" here is Disco Guy (that's his name) jamming to the funky music. My friend StarryPen helped greatly to make this game, as he made all of the music and helped with programming. This game is very short, but I hope it will be sweet!

How to Play: Press the space bar when a dot reaches the marker, Enjoy the Music, etc.

PS. You have to click the web build in order for it to start.
